The shinsengumi are my favorite group in Japanese history. If you are searching for info about them... Read Hillsborough's Shinsengumi: The Shongun's Last Samurai Corps. I will list a few names, although I dont have all the information without refreshing my memory:
  
  Kondo Izami
  Serizawa Kamo
  Shinmi Nishiki
  Hijikata Toshizo
  Yamamami Keisuke
  Saito Hajime
  Okita Soji
  Nagakura Shinpachi
  Harada Sanosuke
  Todo Heisuke
  Yamazaki Susumu
  Hirayama Goro
  Hirama Jusuke
  Shimada Kai
  
  There were originally 13 members, but I dont know which of these were in that group.
  
  Jonathan Ellgen
  
  

cathamstershadow <cathamstershadow@...> wrote:        why don't they have the list of the other members of the shinsengumi 
  the websites that i keep going to don't have anything else besides 
  okita, saitou, and the other leaders.
